qas.question: What did Tito declare himself to be religiously as an adult?
What type of religious educaton did Tito attend as a child?
What did a priest do to Tito as a child when he had difficulty removing the priest's vestments?
After being yelled at by a priest as a child, what place of worship would Tito refuse to enter again?

context: In his youth Tito attended <a1_0>Catholic<a1_0/> Sunday school, and was later an altar boy. After an incident where he was <a2_0>slapped and shouted at<a2_0/> by a priest when he had difficulty assisting the priest to remove his vestments, Tito would not enter a <a3_0>church<a3_0/> again. As an adult, he frequently declared that he was an <a0_0>atheist<a0_0/>.
